title: Out of the Mouths of Serial Killers
description: WHY DO SERIAL KILLERS KILL?OUT OF THE MOUTHS OF SERIAL KILLERS​ by author Mary Brett is as close as you will ever come to discovering the answer ... and in the killer's own words!In this one-of-a-kind book,  author Mary Brett corresponded with some of America's most evil convicted serial killers and asked just one question: ​WHY? Their return letters give an insightful look into the dark mind of each killer. The reader also will be able to scrutinize direct quotes, unedited, from ​interrogation statements, trial testimony, media interviews, and parole hearing inquests.75 Serial Killers are included in the book,  some only known to the unfortunate victims' family, friends, and community, while others are the most infamous in the annals of serial killers. All bios feature the crime, the capture, the victims, and background facts. Crime scene photos, some graphic, are featured.
author: Mary Brett
